method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_get_num_fields
method.comment: Gets the number of fields used by @self.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_set_num_fields
method.comment: Sets how many fields the @self will hold. If @num_fields is smaller than the current number of fields, the excess fields are freed.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_get_field_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: the zero-based index of the field to retrieve

method.comment: Gets the @self @position field. Returns %NULL when the item is not set or when the @position is out of bounds.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_set_field_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: the zero-based index of the field to set

method.comment: Sets the @self @position field to @field. If @position is beyond the current number of fields, the number of fields is extended to accommodate it. Any existing field at @position is freed before being replaced.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_as_vcard_string

parameter.name: is_param
parameter.comment: whether the @self corresponds to a parameter

method.comment: Converts the @self into its string representation.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_structured_unref
method.comment: Decrements the reference count of @self. If this was the last reference, @self is freed.
